name: The end of Harper Jones
description:
A lovecraftian inspired horror game being developed in RPG maker vx ace, The end of Harper Jones aims to be a love letter to cosmic horror.

The story of the game:
Our young protagonist Harper Jones returns home from school one day to find a mysterious package waiting for her. After opening it up she's dragged off to a house of horrific monstrosities and a uncomfortable letter that informs her her alleged grandfather is behind it all. 

This page will be updated once more progress has been made.
